title: The Beauty of Christmas Traditions
itunes:title: The Beauty of Christmas Traditions
itunes:subtitle: What is Christmas really?
description:
The nostalgia is real for us this week as we run through our old and new holiday traditions, how Christmas really started (including some interesting historical traditions and where they come from), and when we learned that Santa Claus wasn't real.


In addition to this week's topic, Aleena walks us through her omicron covid nightmare in New York where she's still in quarantine (Thanks Santa Con) and how Covid has literally become the new "STD" of our generation. And for a good portion of the episode, we dive a little deeper than usual during our fan favorite BBQ's to discuss the most recent development with the Tristan Thompson and Khloe Kardashian scandal, Ben Affleck's most recent statements about his drinking and marriage to Jennifer Garner, and Selling Sunset's Jason Oppenheim and Chrishell Stause's break up.



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com





Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
